front.title: RTP Payload Format for ITU-T Recommendation G.722.1
front.abstract: International Telecommunication Union (ITU-T) Recommendation G.722.1 is a wide-band audio codec. This document describes the payload format for including G.722.1-generated bit streams within an RTP packet. The document also describes the syntax and semantics of the Session Description Protocol (SDP) parameters needed to support G.722.1 audio codec. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
